titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2609) making appropriations for energy and water development and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2014, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-144, by Mr. Burgess.
The resolution provides that the bill shall be considered for amendment under the five-minute rule.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 39.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 288.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 182 (Roll no. 308).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 178 (Roll no. 309).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/8/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2609) making appropriations for energy and water development and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2014.
